data.title: ott april 2024: Latest News & Videos, Photos about ott april 2024
data.meta_description: ott april 2024 Latest Breaking News, Pictures, Videos, and Special Reports from The Economic Times. ott april 2024  Blogs, Comments and Archive News on Economictimes.com
data.text:
Go To Page 1

'Clipped' explores behind-the-scenes controversy surrounding Los Angeles Clippers

‘Clipped’ is a documentary that explores the workplace controversies of the basketball team Los Angeles Clippers. It explores the role of their manager and the effects the toxic behavior had on the morale of the team.

05 Jun, 2024, 02:12 AM IST

Telcos now targeting T20 cricket world cup to boost data usage, ARPU

Telecom companies are capitalizing on the cricket fever post IPL by launching low-priced data packs and bundled subscriptions for the upcoming World Cup to boost data usage and revenue per user.

04 Jun, 2024, 05:23 PM IST

'Broadcasting policy must exclude OTT, online gaming and music': Stakeholders to TRAI

Media and entertainment industry stakeholders are urging the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) to confine its recommendations on the National Broadcasting Policy (NBP) solely to matters within the broadcasting sector. They advocate for the exclusion of non-broadcasting concerns such as OTT, online gaming, film, and music, citing that these areas fall outside TRAI's jurisdiction.

21 May, 2024, 12:53 AM IST

Dark Matter Apple TV+ sci-fi series: Release date, plot, cast, all you need to know

The thriller which is an adaptation of a popular novel by Blake Crouch, will be seen as an Apple TV+ series very soon. The series boasts of a very high budget along with a star-studded cast and it is to be seen if this sci-fi series delivers according to the high expectations.

06 May, 2024, 10:47 PM IST

'Spy x Family Code: White' release date: Where to watch full movie online?

"Spy x Family Code: White" has been released in the theatres and now the question when will the move be available for online viewing.

20 Apr, 2024, 10:48 PM IST

'Mirzapur 3' update: What did 'Madgaon Express' actor Avinash Tiwari reveal about Divyenndu Sharma aka Munna bhaiya?

Avinash Tiwari, known for 'Madgaon Express,' discussed 'Mirzapur 3' and his interaction with Nora Fatehi. He mentioned his disinterest in the new season and no updates from Divyendu. Divyendu, who won acclaim as Munna Tripathi, confirmed his absence from 'Mirzapur 3.' The series is set for an April 2024 OTT release on Amazon Prime Video, promising new power dynamics in the Tripathi family.

17 Apr, 2024, 05:18 PM IST

Godzilla Minus One OTT streaming release date: Where to watch, full movie download

"Godzilla Minus One" release date for OTT streaming has been announced. Prime Video subscribers can watch full movie.

From 'Amar Singh Chamkila' to 'Parasyte: The Grey': Check the latest OTT releases of April 2024

Delve into the vibrant world of digital entertainment with our comprehensive summary of the latest OTT releases and upcoming gems for April 2024. From gripping dramas to heartwarming rom-coms, we highlight the diverse offerings across platforms, promising viewers an immersive and thrilling experience. Stay tuned for your weekly dose of binge-worthy bliss!

12 Apr, 2024, 11:23 AM IST

Ahead of Mirzapur 3 OTT release, 'Munna Bhaiya' Divyenndu reveals he won't be part of the new season and why

Actor Divyenndu, famous for his role as Munna Bhaiya in 'Mirzapur,' announced to Humans of Bombay that he won't return for the third season. This news is a heartbreak for fans, given his iconic portrayal of Munna Tripathi, a character deeply ingrained in Indian web series history.

Monkey Man OTT, digital release date, cast, where to watch online, download: Will Dev Patel's movie premier on Netflix or Peacock?

Dev Patel's film "Monkey Man" is releasing on theatres as fans are eagerly waiting for OTT streaming and digital premier dates.

05 Apr, 2024, 06:26 PM IST

From 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' to 'Farray': Watch the latest OTT releases of this week

Explore a diverse array of captivating content with the latest OTT releases. From romantic comedies to thrilling mysteries, these releases offer something for every viewer. Highlights include 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' on Prime Video, the high school thriller 'Farrey' on Zee5, and the gripping drama "Ripley" on Netflix. With stellar performances and engaging narratives, these releases are sure to keep audiences entertained and immersed in the world of streaming entertainment.

05 Apr, 2024, 01:09 PM IST

The First Omen release date, story: Where to watch online, OTT

"The First Omen" movie will first be released in theatres and subsequently it will make its way to OTT streaming platform and digital rental mode.

'Mirzapur 3' OTT release update: What to expect from the thrilling crime drama on Amazon Prime

'Mirzapur' season 3 is set to premiere on Amazon Prime Video in April 2024, continuing the intense saga of power struggles, revenge, and complex family dynamics. The series features a stellar cast including Pankaj Tripathi as Kaleen Bhaiya, Ali Fazal as Guddu Pandit, and Divyenndu Sharma as Phoolchand Munna Tripathi. Fans can expect gripping confrontations, new characters, and a thrilling narrative as 'Mirzapur' season 3 unfolds its dramatic storyline.

01 Apr, 2024, 04:41 PM IST

Here's what to watch on Netflix in April 2024 to make your festive moods even better

Black Sails, Ripley, Killing Eve and many other superb content will be up on Netflix soon and fans can't help getting excited! Here are the details to make your Easter more entertaining.

Peacock to stream 'Lisa Frankenstein' and 'Night Swim'. Will they succeed on OTT after failing in theaters?

'Lisa Frankenstein' failed to recoup its $13 million production budget, despite minimal opening weekend competition.'Night Swim' proved to be a modest financial hit with a budget of just $15 million and the name Blumhouse behind it.

Paytm gets nod to become third-party UPI app; Govt cracks down on OTT platforms

Paytm parent One 97 Communications Ltd has secured approval from the National Payments Corporation of India to become a third party UPI app. This and more in today’s ETtech Top 5.

Tata Motors wants EV sops extended; Peak XV's new fund

Tata Motors, which dominates the local EV market with a share of more than 70%, wants New Delhi to help replicate an enabling environment similar to the one in China that has pledged to support adoption of electric vehicles until unit sales touched at least a fifth of all new cars sold.

As the Sony Spider-Man Universe unfolds its cinematic narrative, Madame Web takes center stage in the latest installment, providing fans with a new lens through which to explore the iconic web-slinger's universe.
